entry.title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 7: Language, Text, and Context | 2020

media:group.media:title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 7: Language, Text, and Context | 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 2, lesson 7 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "How To Interpret Scripture" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled "Language, Text, and Context". Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's lesson is for May 9 to May 15, 2020.
Reading: Deut. 32:46, 47; 1 Kings 3:6; Num. 6:24–26; Gen. 1:26, 27; Gen. 2:15–23; Gen. 15:1–5.
Memory Text: “ ‘Take this Book of the Law, and put it beside the ark of the covenant of the Lord your God, that it may be there as a witness against you’ ” (Deuteronomy 31:26, NKJV).
Sunday (Ryan Day) - “Understanding the Scriptures” Monday (John Lomacang) - “Words and Their Meanings” Tuesday (John Dinzey) - “Repetition, Word Patterns, and Meaning” Wednesday (Kenny Shelton) - “Texts and Contexts” Thursday (Jill Morikone) - “Books and Their Message”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/assets/public/files/lessons/2020/2Q/SE/PDFs/EAQ220_07.pdf

entry.title: Preparation | The Wise will Understand (Live Church)

media:group.media:title: Preparation | The Wise will Understand (Live Church)
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with John Dinzey. The second coming of Jesus is near. Even though no man knows the day or the hour, the prophetic signs are all around. The bridegroom spoken about in the Bible will come back for His Church. Don't be sleeping when He comes! Make preparation like the wise virgins did in the book of Matthew chapter 25. Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Pastor John Dinzey.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 6: Why Is Interpretation Needed? | 2020

media:group.media:title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 6: Why Is Interpretation Needed? | 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 2, lesson 6 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "How To Interpret Scripture" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled "Why Is Interpretation Needed?". Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's lesson is for May 2 to May 8, 2020.
Reading: Luke 24:36-45. 1 Cor. 12:10. 1 Cor. 14:26; Acts 17:16-32; John 12:42-43
Memory Text: “But without faith it is impossible to please Him, for he who comes to God must believe that He is, and that He is a rewarder of those who diligently seek Him” (Hebrews 11:6, NKJV).
Sunday (Jill Morikone) - “Presuppositions” Monday (John Lomacang) - “Translation and Interpretation” Tuesday (Ryan Day) - “The Bible and Culture” Wednesday (Danny Shelton) - “Our Sinful and Fallen Nature” Thursday (Kenny Shelton) - “Why Interpretation Is Important”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/assets/public/files/lessons/2020/2Q/SE/PDFs/EAQ220_06.pdf

entry.title: Lockdown | Keys to Break Free (Live Church)

media:group.media:title: Lockdown | Keys to Break Free (Live Church)
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with Jill Morikone. As many people deal with a literal lockdown, in this sermon we'll study a spiritual lockdown brought about by sin. Our world is filled with iniquity and sadness, but God has not forgotten about us. He's given us a key to get out! Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Jill Morikone.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 5: By Scripture Alone—Sola Scriptura | 2020

media:group.media:title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 5: By Scripture Alone—Sola Scriptura | 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 2, lesson 5 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "How To Interpret Scripture" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled "By Scripture Alone—Sola Scriptura". Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's lesson is for April 25 to May 1, 2020.
Reading: 1 Cor. 4:1-6; Titus 1:9. 2 Tim. 1:13; Mark 12:10, 26; Luke 24:27, 44-45; Isa. 8:20
Memory Text: “For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart” (Hebrews 4:12, NKJV).
Sunday (Kenny Shelton) - “Scripture as the Ruling Norm” Monday (Jill Morikone) - “The Unity of Scripture” Tuesday (John Lomacang) - “The Clarity of Scripture” Wednesday (John Dinzey) - “Scripture Interprets Scripture” Thursday (Ryan Day) - “Sola Scriptura and Ellen G. White”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/assets/public/files/lessons/2020/2Q/SE/PDFs/EAQ220_05.pdf

entry.title: America Shut Down - God's Way Out (Live Church)

media:group.media:title: America Shut Down - God's Way Out (Live Church)
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with Pastor Kenny Shelton. As fear and uncertainty spread and a war wages against the Coronavirus pestilence, it appears something much bigger is happening. In the darkest dimensions of earth the Devil constructs ways to destroy God's people and bring his control over the world. Will we lose our freedom's? Is time up? What will the result be of the trials upon the earth and each person? Even though the church doors are closed and the health of the world's population declines, God has a way out. Bible prophecy is being fulfilled right now.
Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Pastor Kenny Shelton.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
